article.author: Manulife
article.title: Jane – Saved by Travel Insurance
article.lead: Watch Jane tell her tale of what happened when things went wrong on her trip, and how Manulife was there to help.

video April 2020 20 04 03 ​ Carnival car ​ WUATA Story: Top “Why Use A Travel Advisor” Reasons Carnival
There are many benefits of booking with a travel agent. In this episode, travel advisors and their clients share their personal experiences and top WUATA reasons with Adolfo M. Perez, Carnival’s SVP of Global Sales & Trade Marketing.
